Name: Fried Chicken Sandwich
Description: Served with pickles, lettuce, tomato, American cheese, and hot sauce on challah bread

Name: Margherita Pizza
Description: Tomato sauce, mozzarella, and basil on top of our homemade pizza dough

Name: Farm Beef Burger
Description: 250g of house-ground burger topped with caramelized onions and cheddar. Served with french fries

Name: Patatas Bravas
Description: fried potato wedges tossed in a marinade and served with sun-dried tomato aioli.

Name: Kale and Chicory Salad
Description: Pickled peach, toasted almonds, crumbled blue cheese, white balsamic vinaigrette

Name: Green Salad
Description: Mixed greens, spinach, cherry tomato, endive, mustard vinaigrette

Name: Hummus Platter
Description: Fresh traditional hummus, fresh tomatoes, feta cheese and Kalamata olives. Served with warm flatbread

Name: Fish & Chips
Description: Battered and fried to crispy perfection. Served with tartar sauce, french fries and coleslaw.
